title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.1003 - General requirements of a GDPIM plan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.1003 - General requirements of a GDPIM plan

State Regulations
(a) Unless exempted in subdivision (b) of
this section, sections
255.1003
through
255.1015
of this Part prescribe
the minimum requirements for a GDPIM program for any gas distribution pipeline
covered under this Part, including liquified petroleum gas systems. A gas
distribution operator, must follow the requirements in section
255.1015
of this Part. (b) Exceptions. Sections
255.1003
through
255.1015
of this Part do not apply
to: (1)

Individual service line s directly
connected to a production pipeline; (2)

Individual service lines directly
connected to either a transmission line or a gathering line and maintained in
accordance with subdivisions
255.740
(a) and
(b) of this Part; and
(3)

Master meter systems. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.1003

Amended

New

York State Register January 4, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 01, eff. 12/16/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
